meanings.definition: To move from one place to another.
meanings.sent1: I goe to school every morning.
meanings.sent2: She goe to the park on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The cat goe around the house chasing its tail.
meanings.sent4: Time goe quickly when you're having fun.
meanings.sent5: The river goe steadily towards the ocean.

meanings.sent1: We goe step by step to reach the mountain top.
meanings.sent2: The project goe smoothly with everyone's help.
meanings.sent3: The car goe slowly through the traffic jam.
meanings.sent4: The team goe ahead in the competition.
meanings.sent5: The story goe on with unexpected twists.

meanings.sent1: The machine goe without any issues.
meanings.sent2: The computer goe well after the repair.
meanings.sent3: The clock goe backwards for a moment before fixing itself.
meanings.sent4: The engine goe smoothly after the tune-up.
meanings.sent5: The fan goe at different speeds for cooling.

meanings.sent1: They goe to the concert together.
meanings.sent2: He goe to all the meetings to stay informed.
meanings.sent3: The kids goe to the party dressed as superheroes.
meanings.sent4: She goe to the event to support her friend.
meanings.sent5: We goe to the game to cheer for our team.

meanings.sent1: Time goe by quickly when you're having fun.
meanings.sent2: The days goe slowly during the wait.
meanings.sent3: The year goe by in a blur of activities.
meanings.sent4: The seasons goe by changing the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The hours goe by unnoticed while lost in a good book.
